NE, NIJE ŠALA: Edinson Kavani u italijanskom velikanu potpuno besplatno!
03 Nov 2019, 20:07 by Kopi
Prema pisanju francuskih medija, Edinson Kavani može otići bez ikakvih troškova u junu sledeće godine.
Pari Sen-Žermen se odmiče od svojih zahteva i Juventus ozbiljno razmišlja o angažovanju urugvajskos napadača.
Urugvajca je Juventus već hteo 2016. godine nakon odlaska Pola Pogbe, ali su se odlučili za Gonzala Iguaina jer predsednik PSŽ-a nije hteo da se odrekne svog najboljeg strelca.
Danas je situacija potpuno drugačija, a odšteta bi mogla biti potpuno besplatna, a godišnja plata najmanje sedam miliona evra.
– Kavani je još kao mlad napadač voleo Juventus. Ali je spletom okolnosti prvo igrao za Palermo, pa za Napoli. Sada je došlo do ključne tačke jer je dolaskom Maura Ikardija izgubio meesto u ekipi, pišu Italijani.
Dolazak Kavanija u Juventus značio bi samo jedno – manja minutaža i klupa za Gonzala Iguaina.

NO, NO Joke: Edinson Coffeehouse in the Italian giant for free!
03 Nov 2019, 19:07 by Kopi
According to French media, Edinson Cavani can leave at no cost in June next year.
Paris Saint-Germain moves away from his demands and Juventus is seriously considering hiring a Uruguayan striker.
The Uruguayans already wanted Juventus in 2016 after the departure of Paul Pogba, but they opted for Gonzalo Iguain because the PSG president did not want to give up his top scorer.
Today the situation is completely different and the compensation could be completely free of charge, with an annual salary of at least seven million euros.
- As a young striker, Cavani loved Juventus. Did he first play for Palermo, then for Napoli? The key point has now come because with the arrival of Mauro Icardi, he lost his place in the squad, the Italians write.
The arrival of Cavani in Juventus would only mean one minute and a bench for Gonzalo Iguain.
